CustomField.description:
For Self Service and Enterprise Monthly agreements, shows the monthly revenue for that Opp. Should be the full month amount, including for Upsells that happen mid-term. This field will roll up from the corresponding Opportunity and to the Account for Opportunities where “Roll-Up Qualified” is TRUE.
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/New-Salesforce-Fields-Opportunities-Business-Units-Accounts--Ay1q1~SCRlqq2EmE9wVHvqBrAQ-PkyPecvObh7GLmPeED6TB
https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/How-to-Use-the-Opportunity-Fields-April-2020--Ay52tLsUoyROBPXqkP99eIafAQ-Wy8AxHfGwiplwNW20Jhl3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Monthly subscriptions, the total active monthly amount.
CustomField.label: MRR
